title.rendered: Why pick Gulshan Botnia as your dream home?

content.rendered: Noida Expressway has emerged as one of the hottest residential localities in Delhi NCR in the last few years, and hence, many new and interesting projects have cropped up in the area. Don’t get intimidated by the choice since Gulshan Botnia is a clear favourite among many. With its strategic location in Sector 144 Noida and all modern amenities, there is no reason why you should think twice before booking your home here. Here are some key reasons why Gulshan Botnia makes for a great investment:
